title: CHAPTER I. HOW THE CURSE BEGAN.

book.title: The Curse of Carne's Hold
book.description: 简介： There was nothing about Carne's Hold that would have suggested to the mind of the passing stranger that a curse lay upon it. Houses to which an evil history is attached lie almost uniformly in low and damp situations. They are embedded in trees; thei...
